title: Rodrigues dos Santos (José Jorge)
body: He was born in Funchal on April 23, 1879, and is the brother of the previous one. He has a degree in literature and pursued a diplomatic career, having served in the Portuguese legations in Sweden, Denmark, etc. Works: *Caravella* (poems), *Mar de Lagrimas*, *Festa de Actriz*, and *Rosa enamorada* (dramatic plays) (1921).

1879: Birth of José Jorge Rodrigues dos Santos
1921: Publication of the works of José Jorge Rodrigues dos Santos
